msgs.Content: Zel knocked on the door to Sin's mansion, holding a thin package wrapped up with a pretty silvery and blue bow. Contrary to her usual outfit she had elected to wear a teal dress under a black cardigan, her hair held back with the crown Brice had given her.
I hope he's home this time... I should have texted before coming...
*rings the doorbell and waits*

Brice was luckily, home. He was actually heading downstairs to go grab a snack when the doorbell rang. He wasn't expecting any visitors so he could only assume it was for someone else in the house. Uuuunfortunately everyone else was out today doing their various errands to get ready for the party. He got kicked out of it because he wasn't going to do anything productive anyway, and neither was Sloth.

So it had to be Brice to open the door. He sighed and turned tail to the front door to check and see who was ringing, surprised to see ZEL of all people on the other side. And Awww she was wearing his crown <3 He opened up the door and grinned wide.
Zel, hey! I wasn't uh... -he looks around curiously- aware you were coming! Did you text me?? What's that? -Nods down at the package-
Brice!
And suddenly she felt weird. It was their first time after, well,  everything that had happened. But she wasn't going to dwell on that, she didn't want to. She DID want to hug him though,
No I didn't text you,  I wanted to surprise you I guess? *smiles and holds the package to him* Oh you mean this thing? It's for you. Th
Though you probably already know what it is *and a tiny flash of sadness flickered in her blue eyes before she smiled at him*
*but she handed him the package anyway and gave him a quick hug*
Surprise huh? ...... OH

It hits him like a ton of bricks. Their interaction as Sin... Going to get his birthday present and that awesome jersey. He grins even more and takes the package eagerly before ripping it open. Surely enough there it was. Brice accepts the hug and wraps his arms around Zel in a thankful embrace.
It's perfect yes exactly what I wanted, thanks babe~
That last part slips out. He presses his lips together awkwardly and laughs to try and make up for that social faux pas
Ahhhh... Oh hey stay a while I'll get you a drink! I was about to grab a snack anyway -he smiles again and pulls her forward toward the kitchen- Pleeeease?~
She held him, heart fluttering in relief that he'd like it. And her arms kingered around him a second longer than necessary before letting go to smile at him
Sure,  I'd love to stay
That's why she had gotten all dolled up.  For him.
But first... Happy belated birthday, Brice. A pinch to grow an inch. *and she gave his cheek a squeeze between her fingers*
Brice's nose scrunches up with the cheek pinch. He laughs and swats at Zel's hand playfully, taking the small delicate hands in his own and looking down at them.
Mm... Well, pick yer poison. What can I getcha to drink, Princess?~ -raises and places a kiss on the back of one-
She held onto his perfect palm as he escorted away.
Ill just have some OJ maybe? It's really hot ou-

And she paused as he looked directly at her over her hand to kiss to her knuckles. She blushed at his icy touch, it was these tiny things that Brice naturally did that caused those pangs striking at the chords of her heart. She carefully reached over to rub his pinched cheek
Brice...
Real Prince Charming  aren't you. *hesitantly plants her own kiss  against his cheek* I wanted to ask you some things...
-His heart nearly stops in his chest- Y... Yeah? Ask stuff huh? Sure! -His cheeks go slightly pink with the kiss- Lemme just get you that OJ c'mere follow me!
I needed to talk to you

He moves toward the kitchen once more, when inside opening up the fridge and retrieving a bottle of freshly squeezed orange juice. Mumbling to himself he also bends over and grabs a cup to pour the juice for Miss Andrews.
So... What'd you wanna ask me out-I mean ABOUT? What'd you wanna ask me about...?

Her own face reddened at his slip up, but she pretended not to catch it. She leans on the counter, watching him as she tried to word her millions of questions in her head. Well,  maybe she could use the easiest first.
*deep breath* I was really looking forward to your birthday, I'm sorry it didn't work out in time for us...
Brice are you... *her eyes trail over his gorgeous hair, baby  faced cheeks, sweet thin lips and those tiny freckles* are you gonna be like this as long as you live?
Admittedly he's expecting a different question, but this one doesn't surprise him much either. He'd started crossing over to the pantry and stops mid-step when she asks.
Ah, Yeah I think so. You haven't exactly heard my entire story... have you? -nods at the island- Take a seat, lemme grab a snack and I'll tell you just a sec.
But... Thank you, fer remembering my birthday :)
*chuckles* How could I ever forget YOUR birthday, my Prince?

But as she sat she couldn't help but give a small, pained  sigh. She loved him, she knew that. But WHAT she had fallen for... She was completely clueless on that front. Add Breyton to the equation and she felt that she was well over her head in uncharted territory.

But wasn't all Love based on trusting someone completely, believing that they were there for you through thick and thin, that you were there for them? That even while you stumbled in the dark,  you were still safe knowing they- He- would always be there to break your fall.
Or something like that.
She straightened up,  and waited for him to come sit with her
-He returns with a large bag of chips not much later, and goes to take a seat by Zel- Alright... You can have some if you want by the way. Just Cool Ranch Doritos they're pretty good.

Soooo I am a Onceler, as you know. But I have the deadly Sin of Pride as my soul, and that means that It has to leave this body one day. Move on to a new host I guess. -Takes a chip and munches on it thoughtfully- This Onceler died a while ago, he... Died young. But Pride's spirit brought him back as me! If that makes any sense. So I'm both parts Onceler and sin, and I can't age.

I can't die unless I starve, I can't remember that onceler's life, I can't even make a thneed anymore. But that doesn't make me any less able to have feelings. I still have feelings, I promise you that.
She sipped her juice and  listened,  taking a dorito to be polite.
So you're actually the thousands of years old spirit of Pride but you're inside *motions at his body 11*
I mean you chose... Really well *she inadvertently blushed, looking away from him, running a hand through her hair abd tugging at her dress*

But at the news of the Once-lers death,  she remembered Sin with a jolt. No he had been wrong. Brice said Pride would move on to another host. He wasn't going to die. He couldn't. She pushed the thought out of her mind.
Starve?As in not doing the thing where you feed off the Sins of humans?
Right yeah. Well __I__ did the work to be as hot as I am~ Used to be scrawny as balls it was gross. -He chuckles and breaks off another chip- But thank you.

As for yer other question, well, yeh we starve from not taking sin.... A-and that's kinda the reason I had to... Hide our identity from ya. We.......... -swallows- we kill people. But it's the only way we can survive, like vampires sort of. And I didn't tell you because... I..... Didn't think you'd understand, bein' a cop and all that. I should've told you sooner. -He pauses and puts his hand on top of hers- I... know that now.

It actually wasn't too difficult to imagine him as a wiry teenager. And it definitely explained the flawless steel framework that was impossible for anyone his age to have. She took another sip of juice,  eyes again lingering over his boyishly good looks atop the body of Adonis.
Perfect, she'd have to deal with this tantalizingly  forbidden fruit for the rest of her life
But as she thought of how she was actually more than ok with that she froze at his explanation. He could feel her habd tense up under his, not in fear,  but in shock.
You kill people.
*Ok pull it together. You're a cop, it's not murder,  it's manslaughter. You know the difference*
*swallows* and if you don't,  you'll die. So you have to do it. To... Proud people? *swallows again, gripping the hem of her dress*

W-well yeah they're... It's okay don't freak out *He CAN feel her tense up. Quickly he puts his other hand on top and squeezes Zel's* I'm not-listen-I am NEVER going to hurt you. I swear that, with every bit of my bein'. It's gonna be alright just... Breathe.
In fact, if you'll let me I wanna... Be here to protect you. *Rubs over her knuckles* Ya mean a lot to me Zel. I'm still Brice and I still like you, and you know that-I hope.
Her heart was still pumping uncomfortably fast at his method of absolving Sin. She hunched her shoulders,  feeling rather small

I really am... VERY proud,  I mean you probably already know... I'm proud of my job, my  hair, all my accomplishment... *she straightened out as she spoke, thinking about all the GOOD she'd achieved* What I do,  and who I am... I'm - I even take pride in the fact that I'm not jealous or lazy or greedy or (usually) angry. I'm a good person.
And she glowed as she bragged, really forgetting why she had started talking in the first place. But at his touch she looked back at him.
He was so gentle, so caring, so kind. Sure he had his flaws,  quite a few. But it was times like this when he lowered his fuckboy mask, when he was starkly honest with her...
You mean a lot to me too and... I don't need anyone's protection. I'm strong and if I can't handle something, I work harder to better myself.
But when I'm with you...
The hand that had been clinging to her dress reached over to touch his medal
...I  don't have to be...
I want to be protected... And that- that's ok.

Brice watches her brag with interest, a faint smile on his face that she's taking his news... Semi-well at least. He had always been so...... SO afraid of how she'd take this. All this time and it's finally all out in the open.

Zel *He glances down at her touching his medal and then looks back up at her* You are a strong, smart, beautiful woman and you can handle yerself just fine. But I've fallen in love with you, and though you don't need me... I wanna be with you. *Then without warning he leans in and takes her chin, to press his lips against hers in a soft kiss* Please Zel... I'll take care of you I'll treat you right just... Say yes. Will you be my princess, and mine alone?

It was sweet,  so sweet despite the tangy chips taste, his soft, smooth,  dorito saturated lips against hers. She dissolved into the kiss, Her fingers trailed up the silk ribbon of his medal to rest on his nape, gently stroking his cool skin, warm breath mixed with hers as she leaned into the kiss feeling
Inescapably Whole.

*lets go to gaze at him* Before I was going to come by on your birthday and let you know that even though you were young and liked things "hard and fast", I wanted to... I was willing to wait, willing to be your girl. That all that didn't matter to me because I... I thought you were perfect for me.

And her hand slid back over to rest on his cheek, studying his flawless features, his pale skin,  his adorable freckles,  his ocean blue eye,  his eyepatch with the faint blue glow that only accenuated his handsomeness
You're wrong. *and she leaned in to speak into his soft lips* I do need you. You complete me Brice. I thought I was fine alone until I met you. And now I know... I was wrong too.
Whatever you are. A Once-ler, seventeen, a Sin. The important thing to me *she carefully shifted off the seat into his lap* your mine. And I'm yours Brice.
I want to be your princess forever

He takes Zel eagerly into his lap and runs his hands down her sides, kissing her over and over again. Now it's all cleared up and the built up feelings over these past few months. He sighs against her lips loving the taste more and more each time they kiss. Brice has always felt the same deep down. He's always felt like they were meant for each other.
